paragraph: Povilas Meškėla (born June 29, 1964 in Vilnius, Lithuania) is a Lithuanian rock musician and a leading singer of a rock band Rojaus tūzai and formerly Katedra.
He started his career in 1986 and was a co-founder of a band Rojaus tūzai in 1990. Povilas was chosen a national AIDS ambassador of Lithuania in 1999.
